Literature.Title: Shipworm symbiosis ecology-guided discovery of an antibiotic that kills colistin-resistant Acinetobacter
Literature.Author: Miller BW, Lim AL, Lin Z, Bailey J, Aoyagi KL, Fisher MA, Barrows LR, Manoil C, Schmidt EW, Haygood MG

Literature.Title: Resistance mechanisms for Gram-negative bacteria-specific lipopeptides, turnercyclamycins, differ from that of colistin
Literature.Author: Lim AL, Miller BW, Lin Z, Fisher MA, Barrows LR, Haygood MG, Schmidt EW

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=>64 µg/ml,Mouse erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=64 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 23724(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 1600(MIC=>64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Yersinia pestis KIM6+(MIC=>=256µg/ml),Yersinia pestis ΔarnB(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC90=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha (mlaA)(MIC90=<=0.5-1.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli C600(MIC90=2µg/ml)
